automationAngle: Criminal defense and multi-practice law firms operate in high-stakes, client-facing environments where every minute counts. With 31 employees handling thousands of cases across criminal defense, immigration, and personal injury, manual processes for intake, client communication, case management, document tracking, and payment collection create bottlenecks. Automation could streamline the 24/7 intake process, automate client status updates, track court deadlines across practice areas, and improve payment collections - allowing the firm to handle more cases with the same team while providing superior client service.

primary: Client intake automation (web forms, phone routing)
Case management system with deadline tracking
secondary: Insurance claim tracking for personal injury

growthSignals.expanding: Multiple awards and #1 ranking indicates growth
